alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 22 at 12:42PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Moderate to heavy snow across the southern portions of Eureka county... Nevada Department of Transportation webcams and automated weather sensors are showing moderate to heavy snow in Eureka county, specifically around the Eureka area. Visibilities of one quarter mile or less due to the snow is occurring across the Diamond Valley area south to Eureka. A quick inch may be possible in the next hour or so. This will cause slushy and slick driving conditions along State Route 278 and US Highway 50 in the Eureka area. Please use caution if driving in this location and turn your headlights on and use low beams so others can see you. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
